context_bundle.summary: Memory leaks and OOM errors troubleshooting patterns for identifying and resolving memory management issues

onboarding.quick_start: Use memory profiling tools to identify leaks, implement proper deallocation, avoid circular references, and bound data flows
common_patterns: Profile with Valgrind, YourKit, or language-specific tools
Break circular references in GC languages
Use object pooling to reduce allocation overhead
Bound data flows to prevent unbounded growth
